title: [1.7.2/1.7.10][ssp/smp][汉化更新]高级基因 Advanced Genetics MOD 1.5.7
author: Kirito刀剑神域
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Kirito刀剑神域 于 2016-5-15 08:34 编辑 

原本的完全汉化似乎过期了..新版增添/删减了许多呢，所以就汉化了。可以看到连贴图也换了，加减了很多

MOD用途：学会和怪物一样的技能！光是这点就很高级了，本mod还有克隆功能！！
P.S.汉化才没有卖门呢！(哼
汉化名称与原名称对比：




c13c2cf790529822eb0efb4cd4ca7bcb0a46d424.jpg (29.02 KB, 下载次数: 361)

下载附件

汉化名称与原名称对比
2015-1-30 13:30 上传






具体使用方法在这里：正确的使用姿势点我

官方声明：
You are not allowed to sell TeamDNA mods or earn money with them in any way.
You are not allowed to copy or reverse engineer any of the code that was released by TeamDNA.
You are not allowed to upload instances of TeamDNA mods without a written permission of the author.
You are allowed to create modpacks with TeamDNA mods.
All TeamDNA mods must be downloaded from the TeamDNA.de-Server.更新(截至到原汉化的版本)：
Release 1.5.7:
- [UPDATED] IC2 API
- [FIXED] Infinite Health issue
- [FIXED] DNA Breeder issue
- [FIXED] DNA Insulator ISidedInventory issue
Release 1.5.6:
- [FIXED] The ..... Package-Handling issue
Release 1.5.5
- [EDIT] Combustion Generator generates now more energy for one coal
- [FIXED] Hopefully Package-Handling bugs are now fixed...
Release 1.5.4
- [FIXED] Swim in Lava-Ability heals you instead of just prevent you from damage
- [FIXED] Package overflow on clients
- [FIXED] 'Milk producer-Ability Iron-Shovel Ghost Item'-Bug
Release 1.5.3
- [FIXED] Chat got spammend when genes are disabled
- [FIXED] Microscope bugs
- [FIXED] Nightvision bug
Release 1.5.2
- [FIXED] Advanced Genetics 1.5.1 crashed on Servers by loading
Release 1.5.1
- [ADD] Homeostasis Tube
- [ADD] Cavespider Gene
- [FIXED] More Hearts multiplication issue
- [FIXED] Teleporting with Ability caused damage
- [FIXED] Crash by typing help command with AdvGen-Commands
- [EDIT] Healcrystal heals less than before
- [FIXED] Combustion Generate comsumes also container items
- [FIXED] Enderdragon crashed the game by rightclicking
说是说适用于1.7.10、1.7.9，但是亲测1.7.2也可以


最后更新2015-1-30

莫非这样能拉回复？？

replies.author: 豆丁宝宝龙
replies.txt_content: 实测与等价交换2重置版1.9.4存在冲突，会造成所有通过材料合成才能得到的物品的物品不显示价值，无法交换。

replies.author: 豆丁宝宝龙
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 豆丁宝宝龙 于 2016-3-25 13:22 编辑 

1.5.7版本存在较多问题，希望搬运和汉化1.5.9版本，支持作者，感谢汉化！1.5.7不支持RF能量，不支持BC管道连接，1.5.9均已支持。1.5.7汉化文件可用于1.5.9，但核心汉化内容需要另外进行，希望能进一步汉化。
